players.name: Yahia Fofana
players.summary: Yahia Fofana is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Turkish Süper Lig club Çaykur Rizespor. Born in France, he plays for the Ivory Coast national football team.

players.name: Mohamed Koné
players.summary:
Mohamed Koné may refer to:Mohamed Koné (basketball), Ivorian basketball player
Mohamed Koné, Ivorian football striker
Mohamed Kone, Ivorian-Burkinabé football defensive midfielder
Mohamed Koné, Ivorian football goalkeeper

players.name: Alban Lafont
players.summary: Alban-Marc Lafont is a professional footballer who plays as goalkeeper for Greek Super League club Panathinaikos, on loan from Ligue 1 club Nantes. Born in Burkina Faso and raised in France, he plays for the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Ousmane Diomande
players.summary: Ousmane Diomande is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Primeira Liga club Sporting CP and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Ghislain Konan
players.summary: Ghislain N'Clomande Konan is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Primeira Liga club Gil Vicente and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Armel Zohouri
players.summary: Armel Junior Zohouri is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Erovnuli Liga club Iberia 1999 and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Odilon Kossounou
players.summary: Kouakou Odilon Dorgeless Kossounou, better known as Odilon Kossounou, is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays either as a centre-back or right-back for Serie A club Atalanta and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Willy Boly
players.summary: Willy-Arnaud Zobo Boly is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Nottingham Forest. Born in France, he represents the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Christopher Opéri
players.summary: Christopher Téa Opéri is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Süper Lig club İstanbul Başakşehir and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Guéla Doué
players.summary: Guéla Maho Lewis Doué is a professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Ligue 1 club Strasbourg. Born in France, he plays for the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Emmanuel Agbadou
players.summary: Badobre Emmanuel Elysee Djedje Agbadou is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Wolverhampton Wanderers and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Evan Ndicka
players.summary: Obite Evan Ndicka is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Serie A club Roma. Born in France, he plays for the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Jean Michaël Seri
players.summary: Jean Michaël Seri is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Slovenian PrvaLiga club Maribor and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Seko Fofana
players.summary: Seko Mohamed Fofana is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ligue 1 club Rennes. Born in France, he plays for the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Franck Kessié
players.summary: Franck Yannick Kessié is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Saudi Pro League club Al-Ahli and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Ibrahim Sangaré
players.summary:
Ibrahim Sangaré may refer to:Ibrahim Sangaré, French footballer
Ibrahim Sangaré, Ivorian footballer

players.name: Christ Inao Oulaï
players.summary: Christ Ravynel Inao Oulaï is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Trabzonspor and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Jean-Philippe Gbamin
players.summary: Jean-Philippe Gbamin is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for French Ligue 1 club Metz and Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Vakoun Issouf Bayo
players.summary: Vakoun Issouf Bayo is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Italian Serie A club Udinese and the Ivory Coast national team. He is nicknamed The Crow.

players.name: Wilfried Zaha
players.summary: Dazet Wilfried Armel Zaha is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Major League Soccer club Charlotte FC, on loan from Süper Lig club Galatasaray, and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Jean-Philippe Krasso
players.summary: Jean-Philippe Nils Stephan Krasso is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris FC. Born in Germany, he plays for the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Oumar Diakité
players.summary: Oumar Diakité is an Ivorian footballer who plays as a forward for Belgian Pro League club Cercle Brugge, on loan from Ligue 2 club Reims, and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Amad Diallo
players.summary: Amad Diallo, sometimes known mononymously as Amad, is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a winger or attacking midfielder for Premier League club Manchester United and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Evann Guessand
players.summary: Evann Ludovic Vidjannagni Guessand is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Premier League club Aston Villa and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Bazoumana Touré
players.summary: Bazoumana Touré is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a winger for German Bundesliga club TSG Hoffenheim and the Ivory Coast national team.

players.name: Yan Diomande
players.summary: Yan Diomande is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Bundesliga club RB Leipzig and the Ivory Coast national team.
